channel.title: Comments on: Using YouTube’s Video Editor To Promote Your Mobile Apps

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: I've used the video editor a few times to create new clips. If you think about it, the big time saver is using it to clip out sections of a video that has already been uploaded to YouTube. As an example, I am planning on breaking some of the Corona Geek hangouts into smaller clips so that app developers can watch shorter 10 minute clips if they want.
item.content:encoded: I’ve used the video editor a few times to create new clips. If you think about it, the big time saver is using it to clip out sections of a video that has already been uploaded to YouTube. As an example, I am planning on breaking some of the Corona Geek hangouts into smaller clips so that app developers can watch shorter 10 minute clips if they want.
